articles.description: The hugely popular music stream is taken down after a bogus copyright claim against it.
articles.content:
YouTube has said sorry for taking down two of its most popular music streams in response to a bogus copyright claim.
The Lofi Girl channel - famous for its anime-inspired thumbnail - plays relaxing … [+2740 chars]

articles.title: Jeremy Vine show star Storm Huntley gives birth to son and reveals his cute name... - The Sun
articles.content:
JEREMY Vine co-star Storm Huntley has announced the birth of her first child. 
The TV presenter, 35, and her husband LaFontaines frontman Kerr Okan welcomed a baby boy on Monday.
